text: aur allaah hee ne tumhaare gharon ko nivaas sthaan banaaya aur pashuon kee khaalon se tumhaare lie aise ghar[1] banaaye, jinhen tum apanee yaatra tatha apane viraam ke din halka (alpabhaar) paate ho aur unakee oon aur rom tatha baalon se upakran aur laabh ke saamaan, jeevan kee nishchit avadhi tak ke lie (banaaye)
